alert.note: Alert for Graham; Haywood; Macon; Northern Jackson; Southern Jackson; Swain (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 19 at 3:51AM EST until January 20 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Swain, Haywood, Graham, Jackson, and Macon Counties. * WHEN...Until noon EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Where winds blow across roadways, high profile vehicles may be difficult to keep on the road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A lull in strong winds could occur for a time this morning and early afternoon, but winds are expected to pick back up by mid-afternoon and persist through tonight.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Graham; Haywood; Macon; Northern Jackson; Southern Jackson; Swain
